basic.name: Withering Fire (Q)
basic.description: Shoot the closest enemy up to 5 times over 1.5 seconds for 39 damage, prioritizing Heroes. Cooldown is reset on getting a Takedown.

basic.name: Shadow Dagger (W)
basic.description: Throw a dagger at a target enemy that deals 30 damage and an additional 150 damage over 2.5 seconds. Damage dealt by Sylvanas to the initial target spreads Shadow Dagger to all nearby enemies.

basic.name: Haunting Wave (E)
basic.description: Send forth a wave of banshees dealing 114 damage to all targets. Reactivate to teleport to the banshees' location.

heroic.name: Wailing Arrow (R)
heroic.description: Shoot an arrow that can be reactivated to deal 228 damage and Silence enemies in an area for 2.5 seconds. The arrow detonates automatically if it reaches maximum range.

heroic.name: Mind Control (R)
heroic.description: After 0.25 seconds, fire a missile that Mind Controls the first enemy Hero hit. Heroes hit are Silenced, Slowed by 30%, have 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse applied to them, and are forced to walk towards Sylvanas for 1.75 seconds.

trait.name: Black Arrows (T)
trait.description: Activate to cause all Basic Attacks and Abilities to Stun Minions, non-Elite Mercenaries, and Structures for 3 seconds. Lasts for 10 seconds.  Banshee's CurseBasic Attacks infect enemies with Banshee's Curse for 3 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. Deal 25% more damage to enemies with 3 stacks.

1.name: Might of the Banshee Queen
1.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Withering Fire increases Sylvanas's Attack Speed and Spell Power by 5% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.

1.name: Unfurling Shadows
1.description: Quest: Each time an enemy Hero with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse is hit by Shadow Dagger, its damage is permanently increased by 0.5%.

1.name: Overwhelming Affliction
1.description: Enemy Heroes with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse are Slowed by 15%. Sylvanas's Basic Attacks against Slowed enemy Heroes deal 1% of their maximum Health as damage.

4.name: Unstable Poison
4.description: Minions that die under the effects of Shadow Dagger or Sylvanas's Traits explode, dealing 130 damage to nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Summons.

4.name: Mercenary Queen
4.description: Friendly non-Elite Mercenaries near Sylvanas deal 60% more damage. Sylvanas Stuns and deals 30% additional damage to Mercenaries with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse.

4.name: Possession
4.description: Activate to force an enemy Minion to fight for Sylvanas's team. Catapults require 3 charges. Stores up to 3 charges.

7.name: Barbed Shot
7.description: Hitting the same enemy with 5 shots of Withering Fire causes the 5th shot to deal 350% bonus damage.

7.name: Lost Soul
7.description: Increase Shadow Dagger's damage by 10%.  Basic Attacks against Heroes with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse reduce the cooldown of Shadow Dagger by 1.75 seconds.

7.name: Festering Wounds
7.description: Increase Haunting Wave's damage by 15%. Haunting Wave applies 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse.

10.name: Wailing Arrow
10.description: Shoot an arrow that can be reactivated to deal 228 damage and Silence enemies in an area for 2.5 seconds. The arrow detonates automatically if it reaches maximum range.

10.name: Mind Control
10.description: After 0.25 seconds, fire a missile that Mind Controls the first enemy Hero hit. Heroes hit are Silenced, Slowed by 30%, have 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse applied to them, and are forced to walk towards Sylvanas for 1.75 seconds.

13.name: Cold Embrace
13.description: Shadow Dagger reduces the Armor of the initial target by 25 and any enemy it spreads to by 10 for 2.5 seconds.

13.name: Windrunner
13.description: Haunting Wave can be cast a second time for free within 5 seconds after teleporting. Teleporting with Haunting Wave resets the cooldown of Withering Fire.

13.name: Remorseless
13.description: Increase Sylvanas's Basic Attack range by 1. Sylvanas's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse shoot an untalented shot of Withering Fire. This shot of Withering Fire applies Banshee's Curse.

16.name: Evasive Fire
16.description: Hitting an enemy with Withering Fire grants 6% Movement Speed for 2 seconds, up to 30%. Basic Attacks refresh this duration.

16.name: Life Drain
16.description: Heal for 15% of damage dealt by Sylvanas to enemies with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse. Healing is doubled against Heroes.

16.name: Will of the Forsaken
16.description: Activate to become Unstoppable and gain 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

20.name: Deafening Blast
20.description: Enemies at the center of Wailing Arrow's explosion take 50% more damage and are Silenced for twice as long.

20.name: Dark Lady's Call
20.description: Heroes hit by Mind Control have their vision radius greatly reduced for 5 seconds. Mind Control's cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds.

20.name: Withering Barrage
20.description: Withering Fire applies Banshee's Curse, and Heroes hit by Withering Fire reduce its cooldown by 0.75 seconds.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.
